Lithographer: Lithography by George S. Harris & Sons (American, Philadelphia)
Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Heilbrunn Timeline of Art History: The United States and Canada, 1800–1900 A.D.
Description: Trade cards from the "Shadows" series (N87), issued in a set of 50 cards in 1889 to promote W. Duke Sons & Co. brand cigarettes. Each card portrays people or animals casting shadows of other images.
